module.name: upsmodule
module.displayName: UPS Shipping and UPS Access Point™: Official Module
module.description: This module allows you to easily integrate UPS services into your store with a range of guaranteed delivery services (including deliveries to UPS Access Points™) to meet your customers' need for speed and budget.
module.author: UPS
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall!?
